In addition to tuition fees, you will be charged an annualstudent services and amenities fee (SSAF), which is used to maintain and enhance services and amenities that improve your experience as an RMIT student.The SSAF is calculated based on your enrolment load and the maximum fee for 2025 is $365. In addition to tuition fees, you will be charged an annualstudent services and amenities fee (SSAF), which is used to maintain and enhance services and amenities that improve your experience as an RMIT student. The SSAF is calculated based on your enrolment load and the maximum fee for 2025 is $365. Find information on how to apply for arefundas a continuing international student.
